InfoString:
Bot created by *Civer_mau*!

Summarizes messages via DeepSeek API (I have to pay for that, please don't abuse it)

*Commands:* 
- --summarize <number of messages> (Summarizes the last <number of messages> messages)
- --info (Shows info about the bot)
- --version (Shows the version of the bot)

*Summarize Command Flags:*
- --short (Creates a short summary)
- --medium (Creates a medium-length summary - default)
- --long (Creates a long, detailed summary)
- --reason (Uses deepseek reasoning model, slower and very expensive, but can think better)

*Examples:*
- --summarize 50 --short (Summarize last 50 messages in short format)
- -s 100 --long --reason (Summarize last 100 messages in long format using reasoning model)

*Extras:*
Bancho can also send music as long as a message contains specific words!
- Bancho, Pum x3
- Bancho, lofi
- Bancho, noises
Also can send stickers if you mention the bot with @bancho!

> Check out the code: https://github.com/Civermau/Whatsapp-Summarizer-Bot-Go-Edition
> Also check out my website: https://civermau.dev
VersionString:
*Bot version Beta 5.0.0!*
Dropped codebase and started from scratch!
Get summaries, music, and stickers with bancho in the group chat!


> Check out the code: https://github.com/Civermau/Whatsapp-Summarizer-Bot-Go-Edition
